meta.content: Endow Urbandale COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund: Donate To Help Urbandale Residents In Need - Urbandale Schools

Endow Urbandale, a local non-profit, has launched the “Endow Urbandale Emergency Relief Fund” to support residents in need. Endow Urbandale will match up to $20,000 in donations; however, their goal is to raise even more! Donations are being collected through the Endow Urbandale Operating Fund hosted by their fund partner, the Greater Des Moines Community …

div.h4: All Urbandale CSD schools closed for remainder of 2019-20 school year.
div.p: All Urbandale CSD schools are closed; all school-related programs, spring athletics, spring activities, Adventuretime & Community Education classes/programs are cancelled for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. Latest updates here.

input.name: q
input.div: Urbandale will be a school district that brings learning to life for everyone.

img.alt: Endow Urbandale Emergency Relief Fund news

div.h2: Endow Urbandale COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund: Donate To Help Urbandale Residents In Need

div.p: Endow Urbandale, a local non-profit, has launched the “Endow Urbandale Emergency Relief Fund” to support residents in need. Endow Urbandale will match up to $20,000 in donations; however, their goal is to raise even more!

span.class: css-901oao css-16my406 r-1qd0xha r-ad9z0x r-bcqeeo r-qvutc0

p.span: Donations are being collected through the Endow Urbandale Operating Fund hosted by their fund partner, the Greater Des Moines Community Foundation. Funds will be directed locally to the Urbandale Community Action Network (UCAN) and other community organizations depending on the total amount raised. The need is great in our community. For example, UCAN is supplying food, supplies, diapers and wipes three times a week at four distribution sites across the city. Sadly, they continue to run out of items while leaving people still in line. Your donation will support these efforts and more!

div.p: Consider helping Urbandale residents in need by making a donation to Endow Urbandale. #UrbandaleStrong
